about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Animated Token Pack 146: Demonic Horde

This pack contains 31 tokens with idle animations. They have been optimized for play on Fantasy Grounds Unity. Included in this pack:
  • abomination2
  • abomination
  • bluefiredemon
  • crystalgolemgreen
  • crystalgolem
  • crystalredgolem
  • demondarkness
  • demonfire
  • demonice
  • demonpride
  • demonshade
  • demonshadow
  • direbear
  • fhornedsworder
  • fwarbishop
  • grubadultwings
  • grubadult
  • grubchild1
  • grubchild2
  • halfdemonwarmage1
  • halfdemonwarmage
  • horneddiremace
  • hornedswordsmanT
  • mbloodmage
  • mhorneddual
  • mhornedswordsman
  • mystichorror
  • spectre.webm
  • spectre2
  • spectre
  • undeadelvenmage
"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
